name: Leaf by James - Toro
additionalNotes: Leaf by James cigars are a top-shelf collaboration between Black Label Trading Co.’s James Brown and Jim “Island Jim” Robinson, the man behind the wildly popular Leaf by Oscar brand that gained almost instant fame. The cigar is rolled in just one 6 x 50 Toro size with a dark, oily Broadleaf wrapper, an Ecuador Habano binder, and a core of fully aged Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos. Boasting a mellow to medium bodied profile, and brimming with inviting flavors of pepper, oak, espresso, dark chocolate, and cream.
